name: Build It (itch) (Herof123, Ratainen)
description:
Build ships :)

Made For Minijam 107: Music 2.

You need to build ships to defeat the enemies. You can creatively create your own ships.

If your core gets destroyed, you lose and if enemy core gets destroyed, you get a point.

The left block is just a block.

The second left is gravity disabler, only one for one ship

The third left one is a thruster, that you can use to move.

The final one is a gun, that shoots missiles.

CONTROLS:

BUILDING:

SELECT BLOCKS FROM BOTTOM LEFT CORNER

LEFT CLICK TO PLACE BLOCKS

RIGHT CLICK TO ERASE BLOCKS
R TO ROTATE BLOCKS

SHIFT R TO ROTATE BLOCKS IN OTHER DIRECTION

FLYING:

WASD OR ARROWS TO USE THRUSTERS

LEFT CLICK TO SHOOT

R TO RESTART

*USE FULLSCREEN*
